nodes.bodyText: Consider creating at least one unit test for this public method.
Thanks for the review comments, Added a test in ModuleServiceImplResolvePackagesTest.

I'll be picky here... but the property name is not clear... equalsBehaviorSelect would be more appropiate than equalsBehaviorSelectContainer. The same would apply for  the @Datafield... and the html template.
Thanks for the review. I have made changes accordingly.
